div.div: Lake Forest College vs. Grinnell College

tr.td: Grinnell wins toss, chooses to defer, LF receives.
Graham Fisher kickoff 65 yards to the LFC0, touchback.
Al Mitchell rush for 6 yards to the LFC31 (Colton Feller;David Ternes).
PENALTY LFC illegal shift 5 yards to the LFC26.
Al Mitchell rush for 4 yards to the LFC30 (Tom Brinkman;David Ternes).
Pete Scaffidi pass incomplete to Austin Sobey.
Jon Gurchak punt 30 yards to the GC40, Tj Schaid return 8 yards to the GC48 (Austin Sobey).
Sam Poulos sacked for loss of 5 yards to the GC43 (Jake Rotkvich).

Sam Poulos pass complete to Jayson Campos for 10 yards to the GC48 (John Preston).
PENALTY GC illegal shift 5 yards to the GC43.
Sam Poulos rush for 11 yards to the LFC46 (Jordan Cruz).
Graham Fisher punt 45 yards to the LFC1, downed.
